Synchronize Manually Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Tools»Synchronize with ni.com Icon Library from the Icon Editor dialog box to display the Synchronize with Icon Library dialog box. If LabVIEW cannot reach the National Instruments Web server, LabVIEW displays this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to synchronize the LabVIEW Data\Glyphs directory manually with the most recent glyphs in the Icon Library at ni.com.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Icon library ZIP file—Specifies the path to the .zip file that contains all icons in the Icon Library.
  • Icon library XML file—Specifies the path to the .xml file that determines the structure of the files in the Icon library ZIP file.
